title: Citi releases fourth quarter and full year 2011 earnings
summary: Earlier this morning, Citi released its earnings report for the final quarter of 2011. Chief Financial Officer John Gerspach discusses the report in this video. For more information and the full earnings report, visit the Investor Relations section of Citigroup's website.
tag-1: Citi releases fourth quarter and full year 2011 earnings
